sense.def: not of this world, not mundanely linked to appearances

tls:text.tls:line: so that they might become known to later generations

sense.def: spread the contextually determinate objects among or in N2

tls:text.tls:line: and be of benefit to students of the Way,
in order that they might receive the pivot of the teaching

sense.def: politely receive (e.g. responsibilities from a superior); continue to receive; HF 9.1.23: accept (the ruler's line of thought)

tls:text.tls:line: in order that they might receive the pivot of the teaching

sense.def: BUDDH: main doctrine; basic meaning; the main principle or doctrine of a particular sect (typically used in Chan Buddhist texts)

tls:text.tls:line: in order that they might receive the pivot of the teaching

sense.def: main idea; main thought; main meaning; BUDDH: main teaching

tls:text.tls:line: and transmit it among themselves, [

sense.def: one after the other, in a sequence, taking turns, to each other

tls:text.tls:line: and transmit it among themselves, [
taking these words as their authority.
[For them to receive this
2. The Master Hui-neng said:
2. The Master Hui-neng said:

sense.def: (rarely with indirect speech or quasi indirect speech) say S; say that S

tls:text.tls:line: "Good friends,

sense.def: good (善法 not of the dharmas the good ones, but the Buddhist dharma, which is good)

tls:text.tls:line: "Good friends,
"Good friends,

sense.def: BUDDH: = 善知識 good friend and teacher

seg.line: 淨心念摩訶般若波羅蜜法。」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 淨心念摩訶般若波羅蜜法。」
tls:text.tls:line: purify your minds and concentrate on the Dharma of the Great Perfection of Wisdom."

sense.def: to V purifying the N; to V with a pure N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 淨心念摩訶般若波羅蜜法。」
tls:text.tls:line: purify your minds and concentrate on the Dharma of the Great Perfection of Wisdom."

tls:text.tls:srcline: 淨心念摩訶般若波羅蜜法。」
tls:text.tls:line: purify your minds and concentrate on the Dharma of the Great Perfection of Wisdom."

sense.def: with a moral purity purity of heart

tls:text.tls:srcline: 淨心念摩訶般若波羅蜜法。」
tls:text.tls:line: purify your minds and concentrate on the Dharma of the Great Perfection of Wisdom."
The Master stopped speaking

sense.def: cease to V; start not to V

tls:text.tls:line: The Master stopped speaking
and quieted his own mind.
and quieted his own mind.

sense.def: (V) one's own (N) 自為禍 "bring about one's own misfortune"

tls:text.tls:line: Then after a good while he said:

sense.def: after a long time 良久乃

tls:text.tls:line: Then after a good while he said:

sense.def: idiomactically in BUDDH texts: be silent for a long while

tls:text.tls:line: "Good friends, listen quietly.

sense.def: with impeccable (Buddhist) moral purity of mind

tls:text.tls:line: "Good friends, listen quietly.

sense.def: you listen to me! Listen to what I have to say! (Mostly the subject of imperatives is omitted, so that here as elsewhere with verbs in the imperative one might be tempted to write the syntactic category as: vt[0][oN] . But there are apparent exceptions. In these exceptions it is typically possible to take the apparent subject as a separate vocative, along the lines of: Good friends! [You] must...)

tls:text.tls:line: My father

sense.def: loving, caring 慈母, benevolent, kin

tls:text.tls:line: He was [later] dismissed from his post

sense.def: be banished so as to end up in

tls:text.tls:line: He was [later] dismissed from his post
and banished as a commoner to Hsin-chou in Ling-nan.

sense.def: become, turn into; turn oneself into

tls:text.tls:line: and banished as a commoner to Hsin-chou in Ling-nan.

sense.def: ordinary member of the common people

tls:text.tls:line: While I was still a child,
my father died [an untimely death. K. Dunhuang reads 小 instead of 又]
my father died [an untimely death. K. Dunhuang reads 小 instead of 又]

sense.def: also the predicate; also the object; in addition; moreover; to make things worse

tls:text.tls:line: my father died [an untimely death. K. Dunhuang reads 小 instead of 又]
my father died [an untimely death. K. Dunhuang reads 小 instead of 又]
and my old mother and I, a solitary child,
and my old mother and I, a solitary child,
and my old mother and I, a solitary child,
and my old mother and I, a solitary child,
moved to Nan-hai.14
We suffered extreme poverty and

sense.def: be difficult, be strenuous, full of hardship be in distress

tls:text.tls:line: We suffered extreme poverty and

sense.def: be quite destitute; be completely indigent

tls:text.tls:line: here I sold firewood in the market place.

sense.def: offer for sale, be prepared to sell

tls:text.tls:line: here I sold firewood in the market place.
By chance a certain man bought some firewood

sense.def: by coincidence (probably there are many places where one mechanically translates this word as "suddenly" where "as it happened" and the like are preferable.)

tls:text.tls:line: By chance a certain man bought some firewood
By chance a certain man bought some firewood

sense.def: stranger; person from a foreign country, foreigner, foreign resident; immigrant; person from a different place;

tls:text.tls:line: By chance a certain man bought some firewood

sense.def: buy, acquire (official positions) for money; go out to buy; try to buy; buy (a person from his employer)

tls:text.tls:line: and then took me with him to the lodging house for officials.
and then took me with him to the lodging house for officials.
and then took me with him to the lodging house for officials.

sense.def: send a contextually determinate person off to the place N2

tls:text.tls:line: and then took me with him to the lodging house for officials.
He took the firewood and left.

sense.def: stranger; person from a foreign country, foreigner, foreign resident; immigrant; person from a different place;

tls:text.tls:line: He took the firewood and left.

sense.def: take N (and go on to V)

tls:text.tls:line: He took the firewood and left.

sense.def: taking N to go on to V it> object marker

tls:text.tls:line: I happened to see another man who was reciting the Diamond Sutra.
I happened to see another man who was reciting the Diamond Sutra.

sense.def: read out, recite or at least mumble (usually prose); pronounce cf. even Jin Yong: 讀給他聽。 聽清客讀了，很感興味。

tls:text.tls:line: "I asked him:

sense.def: stranger; person from a foreign country, foreigner, foreign resident; immigrant; person from a different place;

tls:text.tls:line: 'Where do you come from that you have brought this sutra with you?'
'Where do you come from that you have brought this sutra with you?'

sense.def: hold and carry, take along; carry along; support with one's hands

tls:text.tls:line: 'Where do you come from that you have brought this sutra with you?'
"He answered:

sense.def: stranger; person from a foreign country, foreigner, foreign resident; immigrant; person from a different place;

tls:text.tls:line: "He answered:

tls:text.tls:srcline: 見令在彼，門人有千餘眾。
tls:text.tls:line: At present there are over a thousand disciples there.

tls:text.tls:line: While I was there I heard the Master encourage the monks and lay followers,

sense.def: heard how S; hear that S; overhear that S

tls:text.tls:line: While I was there I heard the Master encourage the monks and lay followers,

tls:text.tls:srcline: 我於彼聽見大師勸道俗，
tls:text.tls:line: While I was there I heard the Master encourage the monks and lay followers,

sense.def: encourage a person N, or by extension an attitude N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 我於彼聽見大師勸道俗，
tls:text.tls:line: While I was there I heard the Master encourage the monks and lay followers,
saying that if they recited just the one volume, the Diamond Sutra, [hold onto! Check Y's text]

sense.def: hold on to, not let go of

tls:text.tls:line: they could see into their own natures
and with direct apprehension become Buddhas.'

sense.def: gain an immediate understanding of things

tls:text.tls:line: and with direct apprehension become Buddhas.'

sense.def: manage to become an N 成霸

tls:text.tls:line: ''Hearing what he said,
I realized that I was predestined to have heard him.
I realized that I was predestined to have heard him.
Then I took leave of my mother [parent! note the difference between meaning and reference. CH]

sense.def: take leave from; say farewell to

tls:text.tls:line: Then I took leave of my mother [parent! note the difference between meaning and reference. CH]
and went to Feng-mu shan in Huang-mei

sense.def: go to N in order to V

tls:text.tls:line: and made obeisance to the Fifth Patriarch, the priest Hung-Jen.
'Where are you from
that you come to this mountain to make obeisance to me?

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:text.tls:line: that you come to this mountain to make obeisance to me?

sense.def: make a ritual deep bow as sign of respect to, bow to, pay one's respects to

tls:text.tls:line: that you come to this mountain to make obeisance to me?

sense.def: as object of transitive verb, also as pivot, and particularly as object of coverbs

tls:text.tls:line: Just what is it that
Just what is it that

sense.def: the place where N is; the side of N, next to N, direction of N

tls:text.tls:line: you are looking for from me?'

sense.def: particle indicating or reinforcing a question

tls:text.tls:line: 'I am from Ling-nan,
'I am from Ling-nan,
a commoner from Hsin-chou.

sense.def: ordinary member of the common people

tls:text.tls:line: I have come this long distance only to make obeisance to you.

sense.def: make a ritual deep bow as sign of respect to, bow to, pay one's respects to

tls:text.tls:line: I have come this long distance only to make obeisance to you.
I am seeking no particular thing, [nothing else: CH]

sense.def: seek to V (often difficult to distinguish from TRY...)

tls:text.tls:line: but only the Buddhadharma.' [to become a Buddha (or does Y see another text? Check! CH]

sense.def: become, turn into; turn oneself into

tls:text.tls:line: "The Master then reproved me, saying:

sense.def: declare responsible for misdeeds (without proposing legal action)

tls:text.tls:line: 'If you're from Ling-nan
'If you're from Ling-nan
then you're a barbarian.20
How can you become a Buddha?'

sense.def: how, in what way WANGFANZHI 206DATANG XINYU 大唐新語 1: 油衣若為得不漏

tls:text.tls:line: How can you become a Buddha?'

sense.def: be able to undertake; be up to; have the capability to

tls:text.tls:line: How can you become a Buddha?'

sense.def: become, turn into; turn oneself into

tls:text.tls:line: there is no north and south in Buddha nature.

sense.def: BUDDH: one's Buddha-nature (the seeds of Buddhahood every sentient being is endowed with); one of the most important terms in East Asian Buddhism

tls:text.tls:line: Although my barbarian's body and your body are not the same, what difference
Although my barbarian's body and your body are not the same, what difference

sense.def: the body of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: Although my barbarian's body and your body are not the same, what difference

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:text.tls:line: Although my barbarian's body and your body are not the same, what difference
is there in our Buddha nature?'

sense.def: BUDDH: one's Buddha-nature (the seeds of Buddhahood every sentient being is endowed with); one of the most important terms in East Asian Buddhism

tls:text.tls:line: is there in our Buddha nature?'
The Master wished to continue his discussion with me;

sense.def: by way of continuing what went before

tls:text.tls:line: The Master wished to continue his discussion with me;
however, seeing that there were other people nearby,

sense.def: side of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: Then he sent me

sense.def: send out (a person, for a task)

tls:text.tls:line: where I spent over eight months treading the pestle.
where I spent over eight months treading the pestle.

sense.def: HYDCD 7.1056 has picture: mortar with stone club, later mechanised device combining these two into one contraption for the process of chōng 舂. This requires skill avoiding to squash the grain by not pounding too hard, and pounding hard enough to remove the husk. The device was moved with one's feet in Platform Sutra times: 蹋碓

tls:text.tls:line: where I spent over eight months treading the pestle.
where I spent over eight months treading the pestle.

seg.line: 五祖忽於一日喚門人盡來，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 五祖忽於一日喚門人盡來，
tls:text.tls:line: 4. "Unexpectedly one day the Fifth Patriarch called his disciples to come,

tls:text.tls:srcline: 五祖忽於一日喚門人盡來，
tls:text.tls:line: 4. "Unexpectedly one day the Fifth Patriarch called his disciples to come,
and when they had assembled,

sense.def: (both of humans and of things) assemble SHIJI 百鬼集矣"all the ghosts and spirits had already assembled"

tls:text.tls:line: and when they had assembled,

sense.def: This is a rather grammaticalized usage of 訖 marking the temporal anteriority of S1 to S2: after S1, S2 (see 了 and 已 in this function)

tls:text.tls:line: 'Let me preach to you.
make offerings all day long

sense.def: the whole day, all day long, day after day

tls:text.tls:line: make offerings all day long
and seek only the field of blessings,22
and seek only the field of blessings,22
and seek only the field of blessings,22

sense.def: BUDDH: event promising blessings in the future

tls:text.tls:line: but you do not seek to escape from the bitter sea of birth and death.
but you do not seek to escape from the bitter sea of birth and death.

sense.def: the cycle of death and rebirth

tls:text.tls:line: but you do not seek to escape from the bitter sea of birth and death.
Your own self-nature obscures the gateway to blessings;
Your own self-nature obscures the gateway to blessings;

sense.def: BUDDH: self-nature; intrinsic nature; essential nature (i.e. something which exits independently from other constituents of existense, therefore "self-nature" is denied in Buddhist philosophy) SANSKRIT: tathatā; dharmatā; svabhāva; prakṛti See DDB: http://www.buddhism-dict.net/cgi-bin/xpr-ddb.pl?81.xml+id('b81ea-6027')

tls:text.tls:line: how can you be saved?

sense.def: it is possible to V, one can V; it is possible that there be V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: how can you be saved?

sense.def: come to (someone's) aid, come to the rescue of, support someone in adversity

tls:text.tls:line: how can you be saved?

sense.def: you [freely interchangeable with 汝等 in one and the same context.!]

tls:text.tls:line: All of you return to your rooms and look into yourselves.
All of you return to your rooms and look into yourselves.
All of you return to your rooms and look into yourselves.
All of you return to your rooms and look into yourselves.
All of you return to your rooms and look into yourselves.
Men of wisdom

sense.def: wisdom BUDDH: (perfection of) wisdom (one of the Six Perfections of a Bodhisattva, liùdù 六度, see also bānrěbōluómì 般若波羅蜜); skr. prajñā-pāramitā

tls:text.tls:line: Each of you write a verse and bring it to me.
Each of you write a verse and bring it to me.

sense.def: show the contextually determiate N1 to N2

tls:text.tls:line: Each of you write a verse and bring it to me.

sense.def: as object of transitive verb, also as pivot, and particularly as object of coverbs

tls:text.tls:line: I will read your verses,

(Mostly the subject of imperatives is omitted, so that here as elsewhere with verbs in the imperative one might be tempted to write the syntactic category as: vt[0][oN] .
